SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id JOIN permissions p ON r.role_id = p.role_id WHERE u.user_id = 3;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id WHERE r.role_id = 2;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id JOIN permissions p ON r.role_id = p.role_id WHERE u.user_id = 5 AND r.role_id = 1;
